main.title: 2480 High-Performance Model
main.text: The 2480 high-performance model is a 2U 4-socket server powered by Kunpeng 920 (64 cores, 2.6 GHz). The server provides up to 256 cores and 24 NVMe SSDs. The 2480 features high computing density, high storage performance, and fast network speed. It is ideal for scenarios such as high-performance computing, databases, and cloud computing.
bottomTip1: Move the mouse to rotate the model
bottomTip2: Move the mouse to move the model
bottomTip3: Move the mouse to zoom in or out the model
disk_node: Various drive configurations. For details:</br>Server with 8 x 2.5-inch drives in Expander mode</br>Server with 24 x 2.5-inch drives in Expander mode
nic_node: One FlexIO card that provides four 25GE or 10GE optical ports and supports PXE
power_node: 2 x 1500 W, 2000 W, or 3000 W hot-swappable AC PSUs, supporting 1+1 redundancy
cpu_node: Four HUAWEI Kunpeng 920 processors with 64 cores or 48 cores at a frequency of 2.6 GHz
